about_the_game:
FishCanRun2 Is a 2D runner with 3D modeled graphics and dynamic lighting - this combo gives us unique and interesting picture!

Help Frank pass thru 10 different levels in different daytime and dont forget to watch the background, on your path could be some troublemaking trees, traffic lights or

gigantic flying bombs. Difficulty rises with progress.

Timings are important! - You will have to choose jump or stop or run, run, run, cause oxygen runs out!

And don't get upset if you didn't make it from first attempt, restart button will be always there and with no advertisements.

Stop is in the AIR! - Yes now it it is possible, and if you hit stop in jump, Frank will stop immediately, but don't forget that Oxygen is running out.

To Reffill the Oxygen, just stop at any water storage

Tired?- Our new Save/Load system will autosave your progress, so you can continue next time simply pressing Load button in our main menu

No enemies, cruelty, kills, shootings, just you, fish, legs and air plus chilly sound on the background!

Hurry up, oxygen runs out, Frank needs your help!
detailed_description:
FishCanRun2 Is a 2D runner with 3D modeled graphics and dynamic lighting - this combo gives us unique and interesting picture!

Help Frank pass thru 10 different levels in different daytime and dont forget to watch the background, on your path could be some troublemaking trees, traffic lights or

gigantic flying bombs. Difficulty rises with progress.

Timings are important! - You will have to choose jump or stop or run, run, run, cause oxygen runs out!

And don't get upset if you didn't make it from first attempt, restart button will be always there and with no advertisements.

Stop is in the AIR! - Yes now it it is possible, and if you hit stop in jump, Frank will stop immediately, but don't forget that Oxygen is running out.

To Reffill the Oxygen, just stop at any water storage

Tired?- Our new Save/Load system will autosave your progress, so you can continue next time simply pressing Load button in our main menu

No enemies, cruelty, kills, shootings, just you, fish, legs and air plus chilly sound on the background!

Hurry up, oxygen runs out, Frank needs your help!
legal_notice: Game contains music on background written and allowed to use by - Feel Hovrin, MaxPVNK
name: Fish Can Run 2

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660/ RX580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 8000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1660/ RX580
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You will help Frank to pass thru 10 diferent levels By using only your mouse Press Blue Button with arrow to command Frank to Jump Press Red Button with stop to command Frank to Stop And do not forget that your Oxygen is limited
